sections.heading: What is ば Conditional?
sections.content:
ば expresses general conditions, requirements, or hypothetical situations. It means "if" or "when" in a general sense, often implying "if X, then Y is possible/will happen."

安ければ、買います "If it's cheap, I'll buy it" 頑張れば、できる "If you try hard, you can do it" 時間があれば、手伝います "If I have time, I'll help"

children.heading: With verbs: Change final う sound to え + ば
children.content: | Dictionary | ば-form | Rule | | ---------- | ------- | --------- | | 書く | 書けば | く → けば | | 読む | 読めば | む → めば | | 話す | 話せば | す → せば | | 待つ | 待てば | つ → てば | | 死ぬ | 死ねば | ぬ → ねば | | 買う | 買えば | う → えば | | 飲む | 飲めば | む → めば | | 遊ぶ | 遊べば | ぶ → べば | | 行く | 行けば | く → けば |

children.heading: Irregular verbs
children.content: する → すれば 来る → 来れば (くれば)

children.heading: With い-adjectives: Remove い + ければ
children.content: 高い → 高ければ (If it's expensive) 安い → 安ければ (If it's cheap) いい/良い → 良ければ (よければ) (If it's good) ない → なければ (If there isn't)

children.heading: With な-adjectives and nouns: + であれば / ならば
children.content: 静か → 静かであれば / 静かならば (If it's quiet) 学生 → 学生であれば / 学生ならば (If (someone is) a student) 雨 → 雨であれば / 雨ならば (If it's rain) Often shortened to なら in modern Japanese

children.heading: General conditions
children.content: 時間があれば、行きます "If I have time, I'll go" 安ければ、買います "If it's cheap, I'll buy it" 分からなければ、聞いてください "If you don't understand, please ask"

children.heading: Requirements/prerequisites
children.content: 勉強すれば、合格できる "If you study, you can pass" 頑張れば、夢は叶う "If you try hard, dreams come true" 練習すれば、上手になる "If you practice, you'll improve"

children.heading: Hypothetical situations
children.content: お金があれば、旅行したい "If I had money, I'd want to travel" もっと時間があれば、もっと勉強できるのに "If I had more time, I could study more" 彼がいれば、楽しいだろう "If he were here, it would be fun"

children.heading: Can use with commands/requests
children.content: 暇なら、手伝ってください ✓ "If you're free, please help" 分からなければ、聞いてね ✓ "If you don't understand, ask me" Commands are OK after ば

children.heading: Cannot use with past tense results
children.content: Wrong: 行けば、いなかった ❌ Right: 行ったら、いなかった ✓ "When I went, he wasn't there" Cannot describe past discoveries with ば

children.heading: Often with potential form
children.content: 頑張れば、できる "If you try hard, you can do it" 練習すれば、上手になれる "If you practice, you can improve"

children.heading: Example 1: Making Plans
children.content: A: 明日、映画に行かない？ "Won't you go to a movie tomorrow?" B: 時間があれば、行きたいな "If I have time, I'd like to go" A: じゃあ、連絡してね "Then, let me know"

children.heading: Example 2: Asking for Help
children.content: A: この問題が分からないんだけど "I don't understand this problem" B: よければ、教えるよ "If you'd like, I'll teach you" A: 本当？ありがとう！ "Really? Thank you!"

children.heading: Example 3: Giving Advice
children.content: A: 試験、心配だな "I'm worried about the exam" B: もっと勉強すれば、大丈夫だよ "If you study more, you'll be fine" A: そうだね、頑張る "You're right, I'll try hard"

children.heading: Mistake 1: Using with past results
children.content: Wrong: 家に帰れば、猫が寝ていた ❌ Right: 家に帰ったら、猫が寝ていた ✓ "When I got home, the cat was sleeping" Use たら for past discoveries

children.heading: Mistake 2: Wrong conjugation
children.content: Wrong: 行きば ❌ Right: 行けば ✓ "If (you) go" Change う sound to え, then add ば

children.heading: Mistake 3: Overusing in casual speech
children.content: Too formal: 暇なら、遊ぼう ⚠️ More natural: 暇だったら、遊ぼう ✓ "If you're free, let's hang out" たら is more common in casual speech

children.heading: ～ば～ほど (the more... the more...)
children.content: 見れば見るほど、好きになる "The more I look, the more I like it" 練習すれば練習するほど、上手になる "The more you practice, the better you become"

children.heading: ～ばいい / ～ばよかった
children.content: どうすればいい？ "What should I do?" (lit: If I do what, is it good?) もっと勉強すればよかった "I should have studied more"

children.heading: ～なければならない (must)
children.content: 行かなければならない "I must go" 勉強しなければならない "I must study" Obligation pattern

children.heading: Prerequisites
children.content: 会員になれば、割引がもらえる "If you become a member, you get a discount" 申請すれば、許可される "If you apply, it will be approved" 登録すれば、使える "If you register, you can use it"

children.heading: For achieving goals
children.content: 毎日練習すれば、必ず上達する "If you practice every day, you'll definitely improve" 諦めなければ、いつか成功する "If you don't give up, you'll succeed someday" 早く寝れば、朝すっきり起きられる "If you sleep early, you can wake up refreshed"

children.heading: Expressing desires
children.content: お金があれば、世界中を旅行したい "If I had money, I'd want to travel around the world" 時間があれば、もっと勉強できるのに "If I had time, I could study more" 彼がいれば、寂しくないのに "If he were here, I wouldn't be lonely"

children.heading: ば - General/formal
children.content: 安ければ、買います "If it's cheap, I'll buy it" (general condition) More formal feeling Abstract condition

children.heading: たら - Specific/casual
children.content: 安かったら、買います "If it's cheap, I'll buy it" (specific instance) More casual Concrete situation

children.heading: Both often work
children.content: 時間があれば、行きます ✓ 時間があったら、行きます ✓ "If I have time, I'll go" Slight nuance difference

children.heading: ～なければ (if not)
children.content: 急がなければ、遅れる "If you don't hurry, you'll be late" 勉強しなければ、合格できない "If you don't study, you can't pass" 行かなければならない "(I) must go" (if I don't go, it's not good)

children.heading: ～であれば (formal)
children.content: 学生であれば、割引があります "If you're a student, there's a discount" 可能であれば、お願いします "If it's possible, please (do it)" More formal than なら

children.heading: どうすればいい
children.content: どうすればいいですか "What should I do?" 何を食べればいい？ "What should I eat?" Asking for advice

children.heading: ～ば～ほど
children.content: 考えれば考えるほど、分からなくなる "The more I think, the less I understand" 勉強すれば勉強するほど、面白くなる "The more I study, the more interesting it becomes"

children.heading: あれば／いれば
children.content: お金があれば - If there's money 時間があれば - If there's time 人がいれば - If there are people

children.heading: Casual: plain + ば
children.content: 安ければ、買う "If it's cheap, I'll buy"

children.heading: Polite: plain + ば + polite ending
children.content: 安ければ、買います "If it's cheap, I'll buy" Common pattern

children.heading: Godan verbs
children.content: 書く → 書けば (if you write) 読む → 読めば (if you read) 話す → 話せば (if you speak)

children.heading: Ichidan verbs
children.content: 食べる → 食べれば (if you eat) 見る → 見れば (if you see) 起きる → 起きれば (if you wake up)

children.heading: Irregular verbs
children.content: する → すれば (if you do) 来る → 来れば (if you come)

children.heading: Basic
children.content: 時間があれば、行きます "If I have time, I'll go" 分からなければ、聞いてください "If you don't understand, please ask" 安ければ、買いたい "If it's cheap, I want to buy it"

children.heading: Intermediate
children.content: もっと勉強すれば、試験に合格できると思います "If you study more, I think you can pass the exam" よければ、一緒に食事に行きませんか "If you'd like, won't you go to dinner together?" 毎日練習すれば、必ず上手になります "If you practice every day, you'll definitely improve"

children.heading: Advanced
children.content: この問題を解決したければ、まず原因を 特定しなければならない。原因が分かれば、 対策を立てることができる。 "If you want to solve this problem, first you must identify the cause. If you understand the cause, you can formulate countermeasures." もし私にもっと時間とお金があれば、 世界中を旅して、様々な文化を学びたい。 そうすれば、もっと広い視野を持てるだろう。 "If I had more time and money, I'd want to travel around the world and learn about various cultures. If I did that, I could have a broader perspective."
